## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G04870](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G04870)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PDE181, SPC1, ZDS</u>
- **Gene Name:** PIGMENT DEFECTIVE EMBRYO 181, SPONTANEOUS CELL DEATH 1, zeta-carotene desaturase
- **Description:**   zeta-carotene desaturase;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2114789
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
